name: Super (itch) (Bornato)
description:
Z: Jump/Confirm        X: Shoot        Arrow Keys: Walk/Point        A/S: Change Weapon        Down Arrow to interact

This game was made in 10 days for the Black&White Jam.
Join the game's Discord Community! (ingame link is broken)

Bornato: Programming, Story, Level Design
raphaelgoulart: Music, SFX, Programming
Hertin: Tileset
Nyronmi: Character Art and Design

In case you're stuck: Try the different responses for each NPC, and you might get something new.

This game was my first ever experience with building a full game, and my first ever experience with a Game Jam
